record.title: BIPARTISAN IRAQ LEGISLATION--MOTION TO PROCEED

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I move to proceed to the bill and send a cloture motion to the desk.

record.chair: The cloture motion having been presented under rule XXII, the Chair directs the clerk to read the motion.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the cloture vote on the motion to proceed occur at 5:30 p.m. on Monday, that the mandatory quorum be waived, and that if cloture is invoked, it be in order to file cloture on the bill before the close of business on Tuesday next.
